topics.body:
Here's something to warm the heart; a person in saudi arabia figured out a way to help the hungry without them feeling ashamed; simple a charity fridge.

What I mean by this I have had to ask for food before from charity and I'm not going to lie there are some massive assholes out there that make you feel bad for asking for food.  "Haha look at the poor person coming out of the food pantry!"

The charity fridge is essentially a neighborhood fridge that if you want to donate food you can put it in and if you're hungry just take some food.  Of course there's assholes that will take the food out even if they don't need it, but they already do this already.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
